Early Europeans called it Ayers Rock, but its proper name is "Uluru,"...
...the centerpiece of Uluru-Kata Tjuta National Park.
For over 30,000 years, this area has been home to Anangu,...
...the traditional aboriginal peoples who hold this land...
Make no mistake, this is a mystical place.
You feel it as you draw nearer.
And when you're right underneath the rock,...
...it's bigger than anything that you can possibly imagine,...
...and it surrounds you and envelops you.
